text: Wiesenthal is a surname of German origin. ==Notable individuals with the surname== * Charles Fredrick Wiesenthal (1726 – 1789), one of the inventors of the sewing machine * Grete Wiesenthal (1885 – 1970), an Austrian dancer and choreographer * Simon Wiesenthal (1908 – 2005), a Jewish Galician-Austrian who became a Nazi hunter after surviving the Holocaust * Helmut Wiesenthal (b. 1938), a German sociologist * Mauricio Wiesenthal (b. 1943), Spanish writer from Barcelona, Spain * Robert S. Wiesenthal (b. 1966), an American businessman
title: Wiesenthal (surname)
